name: prefix_a
description: Does the text use the prefix 阿 ā, not as part of a transliteration?

name: prefix_lao
description: Does the text use the prefix 老 lǎo?

name: suffix_er
description: Does the text use the suffix 兒 ér?

name: reduplicated_nouns
description: Does the text use reduplicated nouns?

name: pronoun_qu
description: Does the text use the second-person pronoun ‘he / she’ 渠 qú

name: personal_pronoun_ta
description: Does the text use the personal pronoun 他 tā?

name: personal_pronoun_yi
description: Does the text use the personal pronoun 伊 yī?

name: notes
description: Notes on the vernacular elements of style.

name: error
description: Error message if any issues occurred during analysis.
